scripts.build: npm run build:client & npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: browserify js/client.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production --VUE_ENV client ] -o src/main/resources/static/client.js
scripts.build:server: browserify js/server.js -t babelify -t [ envify --NODE_ENV production --VUE_ENV server ] -o src/main/resources/static/server.js
